description: GOODS SSC W3330-25-045. Two such machines needed
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:**
--------
W3330-25-045: Acquisition of 2x Microchip SyncServer S650 GPS Time Servers or Equivalent

**Contract ID: SSC-24-00026649**
------------------------------

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** June 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 19, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada

### Requirements

* Acquisition of 2x Microchip SyncServer S650 GPS time servers or equivalent

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed via the following links:

* [English](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/0530DD1E-82A1-40F7-AF18-B8026A8E4326)
* [French](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/60B78B1D-5CCE-43B3-9D63-0492EE35CEA4)

### Contact Information

* Eleanor Cesare
* Phone: 613 219-8366
* Fax: 613 960-6026
* Email: [None]
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8, Canada

### Procurement Method
-------------------

This tender is subject to competitive open bidding.

### Trade Agreements
-----------------

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Delivery and Opportunity
----------------------------------------

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
